publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3607.1 Murdo Fraser: Congratulations to Glas Cymru—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3607) in the name of Rob Gibson, leave out from first “Scottish” to end and insert “, if Scottish Water was transformed into a mutual company or not-for-profit trust in the private sector along the lines of Glas Cymru, it could reduce costs to Scottish customers instead of expecting to charge excessive rates to domestic and, especially, business water users, a practice that will continue with the Scottish Executive’s chosen model, and concludes that the benefits to be gained from adopting the Welsh model would be lost if Scottish Water were to be retained in the public sector.”
